title: Miley Cyrus gives a health update as she continues recovering from tonsillitis surgery
text:
Miley Cyrus is recovering at home after undergoing surgery for tonsillitis.

The singer, 26, updated fans on her condition on Thursday, sharing a snap of herself resting in bed.

'Worst part of being an adult,' Miley began in her passage. 'Sick days aren't all popsicles and warm soup anymore... it actually just means a boring AF day alone in bed!

Get well soon! Miley Cyrus is recovering at home after undergoing surgery for tonsillitis

'On vocal rest, got amazing @home doctors/nurses in & out , trying to get me 100 for this weekends Gorillapalooza with @theellenshow UGH (peace fingers emoji). the surgery yesterday went amazing and I am recovering , finally feeling some relief ... just couldn't imagine being able to sing in this state ... taking my voice from me is torture.'

In addition to plenty of bed rest, Miley has been healing with a variety of alternative methods.

The songstress used two healing crystals to help speed up the recovery.

'Most Magic Medicine,' she wrote.

She rocks: Cyrus used two healing crystals to help speed up her recovery

Unwell: Cyrus was in the hospital for tonsillitis surgery recently

Miley has been in the hospital this last week recovering from the ailment, but it looks like she is on the right track now that she has returned home.

At the hospital, Miley was visited by a slew of friends, including her mother Tish and new beau, Cody Simpson.

The singer was back in his arms on Wednesday once she was discharged.

Spreading the love: Miley's pals lifted her spirits with a sunflower bouquet and rose petals on her bed

Back in his arms: Cyrus was back with her new beau Cody Simpson after her stint in the hospital

In a photo posted by Cody, Miley wrapped her arms around him as he took a snap, shirtless.

'She made it home,' he wrote, along with a heart emoji. 'Recovering from surgery send all the vibe$.'

Things seem to be going from strength to strength for the new lovebirds.

Former flame: Cyrus enjoyed a short-lived fling with newly single Kaitlynn Carter after splitting from Liam Hemsworth

It was just last week the long-time friends were seen smooching at Backyard Bowls, not long after she ended her romance with Kaitlynn Carter.

Miley and Kaitlynn were both newly single at the time they started their fling.

The We Can't Stop singer had just ended her marriage to Liam Hemsworth, whereas Kaitlynn had split from husband Brody Jenner.
description: The singer updated fans on her condition, sharing a snap of herself resting in bed. 'Worst part of being an adult,' Miley said. 'Sick days aren't all popsicles and warm soup anymore...'
